programme.title: Thank You For Coming

programme.title: Murders in B éarn
programme.desc: At the foot of the majestic Béarn mountains, the wife of a notable, dressed as a medieval queen, is discovered drowned under the La Légende bridge in Sauveterre-de-Béarn. The exact spot where, in the 12th century, Queen Sancie was condemned to drowning for infanticide...

programme.title: Premiere Affaire

programme.title: Natatorium

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Thank You For Coming

programme.desc: Tohru leaves the Soma house to move into her relatives' newly renovated house, but her relatives do not treat her kindly.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Seeds Of Violence
programme.desc: At the Hamburg DOM festival, Helen Dorn and forensic scientist Weyer witness a paramedic's brutal assault. When a high-society boy is later found dead, unravelling a dark secret linking the two cases.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: A Childhood
programme.desc: As summer drags by, 13-year-old Jimmy, forced by circumstance to become an adult too soon, runs up against the limits of his small hometown and his turbulent life, caught between a mother on the slide and a stepfather who keeps her down.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Vera Dreams of the Sea
programme.desc: Vera, a devoted wife, mother, and grandmother, has her serene life turned upside down by her husband's sudden suicide. As greedy relatives and an underworld scheme threaten their family’s home, she must confront danger and take control of her own fate.

programme.title: Murder in Charente
programme.desc: When 38-year-old Cyril is found murdered on the grounds of a grand estate, pregnant detective Maud Arthuis teams up with private investigator Lucien Labeguerri. As secrets unravel and another murder occurs, the case becomes deeply personal for them both.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.
